title: 求QS快捷商店config的配置说明
author: fuckwuzui
txt_content: 求QS快捷商店config的配置汉化说明

replies.author: 【捣蛋】
replies.txt_content:
#The default number of shops players can make
    default: 10  玩家创建的上限

    #Players with these permissions can create these amounts of shops.
    ranks:
        #Anyone with 'quickshop.vip' permissions, can create 20 shops instead of 10.
        quickshop.vip: 20 #Players with quickshop.vip can make 20 shops.
VIP可以创建的上限

shop:
    #Cost to make a stall
    cost: 10   这个应该是创建商店的花费

    #Should we place display items on the chests?
    display-items: true   改为false 不然玩家会利用bug卡东西

replies.author: 筒子
replies.txt_content:
这个配置不需要你怎么改动的
如果你的箱子创建了以后会有漂浮物，那么就把
display-items设置为false

replies.author: fuckwuzui
replies.txt_content:
__Tong__ 发表于 2015-6-10 22:48
这个配置不需要你怎么改动的
如果你的箱子创建了以后会有漂浮物，那么就把
display-items设置为false ...
我要设置，玩家创建的花费和商店的创建上限啊

replies.txt_content:
